title: Morning Joe 8/13/21
description: The Taliban captured two major Afghan cities on Friday, according to the militant group and local officials, as vital hubs across the country collapsed and the United States rushed to evacuate its citizens.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
